Subject: SQL Permission scan will only successfully execute on 1 of our 4 production servers.
Description: The DBA team has applied all the required permissions to all our production SQL servers so that we execute the scan. However only one of the our 4 production Netwrix  servers is working as expected with permission granted to the SQL servers.. The DBA has worked to resolve this issue but everything from our side looks ok and they have advised we work with you to determine the issue.
What_We_Know__c:
They have issues with their DBs on infrequent basis
Access denied on the servers
Next_Steps__c:
UDL test, basic test
re-entered passwords, awaiting results
Solution_Comment__c: Mainly caused by incorrect access settings in SQL
